name: So It Begins
description:
This is a top down zombie shooter, where you explore a couple of levels and try to reach the end. When you complete the game it will tell you how long you wold survive in a zombie apocalypse (hint: collect all the food, water and medicine).

The game features;

Shooting,

Upgrades,

Pickups,

Story,

Consistent player properties between levels (health and ammo etc),

Melee attack (F key)

Hope you enjoy!
